__e: Mr Smith, I've seen many strange sights this night, but there is no cause on God's earth that would allow me to see this child in the field of battle, sir.
I took a risk by venturing onto that battlefield and they found me.
I came to see your face, so that I alone may find you on the battlefield.
- Some people say love is nothing but a battlefield.
But believe me... the battlefield is the last place you will find it.
If this becomes the battleground your women and children become the first casualties.
The market is rough, so we can't help his death. But the timing was too early.
God reached down to the battlefield to...meddle in the lives of men?
This is the battlefield right here, and this is my case, okay?
